sent.orig: Shopping is love, shopping is surprise, shopping is happiness. And shopping actually what you draw.
sent.trans: 购物是爱，购物是惊奇，购物是喜悦，购物就是本次大赛你描绘的主题。

sent.orig: Does shopping on line have the same procedures as shopping in the super market?
sent.trans: 网上购物与超市购物过程一样吗？

sent.orig: Shopping Shuttle Service to main shopping centre every Monday, Wednesday, and Saturday.
sent.trans: 每周一、三、五为公寓住户提供购物班车服务。

sent.orig: Shopping bag is provided in the shopping mall for the convenience of customers.
sent.trans: 为了方便顾客，商场备有购物袋。

sent.orig: Some shopping malls and supermarkets, like Wal-Mart, issue shopping cards to strengthen customer loyalty.
sent.trans: 一些商城和超市，如沃尔玛，就通过发行购物卡来加强顾客忠诚度。
